message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it for $11,500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. While I believe $11,500 is a fair reflection of its value, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your flexibility. Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Bob, we're getting close. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about $10,250?
Alice, I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. Based on my budget, I am comfortable paying $9,750 for the product.
